contentList.content: Psionic talents are minor abilities that require psionic aptitude but don’t drain psionic power.
Psionic disciplines are the heart of a mystic's craft. They are the mental exercises and psionic formulae used to forge will into tangible, magical effects.
Select two additional Psionic Disciplines that are specific to disciples of the Order of the Avatar.
Select two additional Psionic Disciplines that are specific to disciples of the Order of the Awakened.
Select two additional Psionic Disciplines that are specific to disciples of the Order of the Immortal.
Select two additional Psionic Disciplines that are specific to disciples of the Order of the Nomad.
Select two additional Psionic Disciplines that are specific to disciples of the Order of the Wu Jen.
Psi Points are spent on Psionic Disciplines. The amount of points you can spend at once depends on your Mystic level.
Determines how many Psi Points you can spend at once. Increases with Mystic level.
Using their inner, psychic strength, mystics can read minds, fade into invisibility, transform their bodies into living iron, and seize control of the physical world and bend it to their will.
The Order of the Avatar focuses on manipulating emotion, rallying allies and crippling foes.
The Order of the Awakened seeks to transcend their physical form, unlocking the full potential of the mind.
Immortal msytics use psionic energy to augment the physical form, themselves into living weapons.
Nomads are on a neverending quest to unravel the mysteries of the multiverse, adapting their psionics to ease their travels.
Soul Knife mystics manifest weapons of pure psychic energy that they use to cleave through foes.
Wu Jen control the forces of the natural world, using their minds to manipulate the four elements.
You can alter your body to match your surroundings, allowing you to withstand punishing environments. With greater psi energy, you can extend this protection to others.
You refocus your sight to see the energy that surrounds all creatures. You perceive auras, energy signatures that can reveal key elements of a creature’s nature.
You transform your body, gaining traits of different beasts.
You augment your natural strength with psionic energy, granting you the ability to achieve incredible feats of might.
You channel psionic power into your body, honing your reflexes and agility to an incredible degree. The world seems to slow down while you continue to move as normal.
Your control over your body allows you to deliver acid or poison attacks.
You have learned to harvest seeds of despair in a creature’s psyche, wracking it with self-doubt and inaction.
You cause a creature to be flooded with emotions of disgust.
You place a mote of pure fury within a creature’s mind, causing its bloodlust to overcome its senses and for it to act as you wish it to.
You manipulate the matter that composes your body, drastically reducing your size without surrendering any of your might.
You infuse yourself with psionic energy to grow to tremendous size, bolstering your strength and durability.
You forge an indomitable wall of psionic energy around your mind - one that allows you to launch counterattacks against your opponents.
You transform your body to become a living metal, allowing you to shrug off attacks that would cripple weaker creatures.
You learn to use psionic energy to manipulate others with a subtle combination of psi and your own, natural charm.
You exert an aura of trust and authority, enhancing the coordination among your allies.
You focus your mind on courage, radiating confidence and bravado to your allies.
You tap into a well of primal fear and turn yourself into a beacon of terror to your enemies.
You allow the primal fury lurking deep within your mind to burst forth, catching you and your allies in an implacable bloodthirst.
You tap into the joy within you, radiating it outward in soothing, psychic energy that brings hope and comfort to creatures around you.
You become one with the power of elemental air.
You align your mind with the energy of elemental fire.

As a student of psionic power, you perceive the potential energy that flows through all things. You reach out with your mind, transforming the potential into the actual. Objects and creatures move at your command.
You master the power of ice, shaping it to meet you demands.
You claim dominion over light and darkness with your mind.
Your mind becomes one with elemental water, attuning your thoughts to its ebb and flow.
Your mind reaches into the sky, reshaping the stuff of storms to serve your needs.
You attune your mind to seize control of wood and earth.
You imbue a ranged weapon with a strange semblance of sentience, allowing it to unerringly find its mark.
You create a screen of psychic power that distorts your appearance, allowing you to blend into the background or even turn invisible.
You dispatch part of your psyche into the noosphere, the collective vista of minds and knowledge possessed by living things.
You exert your mind on the area around you, twisting the intraplanar pathways you perceive to allow instantaneous travel.
By analyzing information around you, from subtle hints to seemingly disconnected facts, you learn to weave a string of probabilities in an instant that gives you extraordinary insights.
You wield psionic energy to cure wounds and restore health to yourself and others.
You have learned how to channel psionic energy into your attacks, lending them devastating power.
You wield your mind like a weapon, unleashing salvos of psionic energy.
You create psychic static that disrupts other creatures’ ability to think clearly.
You reach deep into a creature’s mind, destroying it from the inside out.
By channeling psionic power, you gain the ability to control other creatures by substituting your will for their own.
You create a third, psychic eye in your mind, which you cast out into the world. It channels thoughts and knowledge back to you, greatly enhancing your senses.
Carrying capacity is increased by half.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Animal Handling <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison and Acid damage.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Poison and Acid damage.
Enemies within [1] are in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> unless they are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Melee attacks against you will have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Increase your melee attack reach by [1].
Gain half of your Intelligence modifier as a bonus to Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Gain the ability to cast <LSTag Tooltip="Target_Mystic_CommandersImperative">Commander's Imperative</LSTag> when not moving during your turn. Doing so will set your movement speed to 0.
Mobilize an ally, increasing their movement speed by [1].
Allies within [1] will have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against becoming <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against becoming <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
You and allies that start their turn within [1] of you gain [2] movement speed for 1 turn.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Falling damage and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Falling damage and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage and +2 bonus to damage rolls.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage. Has +2 to damage rolls.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage and become unable to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on ice surfaces.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Cold damage. Unable to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on ice surfaces.
Psychic Focus: Mastery of Light and Darkness
Gain immunity to magical and non-magical Darkness.
Immune to magical and non-magical Darkness.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage and become able to traverse water-based surfaces unimpeded.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage. Able to traverse water-based surfaces unimpeded.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning and Thunder damage.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Lightning and Thunder damage.
Psychic Focus: Mastery of Wood and Earth

Your ranged weapon attacks ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. If <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> would normally apply to the roll, it cannot gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls cannot suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. Weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls that would normally have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> can't gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in a skill of your choice.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Sleight of Hand.
Once per turn, increase your movement speed by [1] after teleporting.
After teleporting, increase movement speed by [1].
When casting a healing psionic discipline, the target regains an additional 2 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Psionic disciplines restore an additional 2 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Unarmed and weapon damage rolls count as magical for the purpose of bypassing enemies' resistance to physical damage.
Gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with psionic talents that deal Psychic damage.
+2 to damage rolls with psionic talents that deal Psychic damage.
Can see in the dark up to [1]
Your weapon becomes one with your hand, preventing you from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>.
Attempt to obscure a creature's vision, possibly reducing their sight.
Plant a false belief in the targeted area, summoning a simulacrum that compels nearby creatures to investigate.
Blast a creature with a chromatic beam of energy.
Alter your weight and density, increasing your movement speed by [1] and becoming immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Movement speed increased by [1]. Immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Fuse your mind with another creature's, reducing your stats by 1 and increasing theirs by the same amount.
Strike directly at a creature's mind.
Beguile a humanoid, possibly Charming them.
Torment a creature with intense sorrow, preventing it from taking reactions.
Touch a creature and attempt to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitate</LSTag> it until it takes damage.
Flood a creature with sorrowful visions, reducing their movement speed to 0.
Overwhelm a creature with anguish, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitating</LSTag> it and reducing its movement speed to 0.
Project an image of horror at a creature, reducing their movement speed by half.
Create a wall of energy that may repulse creatures that touch it, reducing their movement speed to 0.
Warp a creature's mind, causing it to regard other beings as horrid. While afflicted, it takes [1] damage at the end of its turns.
Wreak pandemonium in up to six creatures, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> them. While affected, creatures can only use their actions to make melee attacks.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Can only use actions to make melee attacks.
Assault a creature with a surge of rage, causing them to immediately lose concentration.

Drive a creature into a frenzy, giving it <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls, but it can't concentrate on spells and enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls against it.

Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls, but can't concentrate and enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls against this creature.
Provoke a creature, forcing it to move towards you on its turn and do nothing else.
Affected entity has to move towards the spellcaster using the shortest route possible and can't take any other actions or bonus actions.
Escalate a creature's rage, making it attack recklessly. Whenever the creature makes a melee attack, nearby creatures can use their reaction to make a melee attack against them.
Boiling with rage. Whenever this creature attacks, other creatures can use their reaction to make a melee attack against them.
Able to retaliate against the entity affected by Punishing Fury.
Signal up to five allies to move as a unit, increasing their movement speed by [1].
Reveal a creature's weaknesses, giving <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls against it.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally immediately uses their reaction to make a weapon attack.
Able to make weapon attack for free.

Exert an aura of trust and command, uniting your allies to move as a cohesive unit. Nearby allies can Dash or Disengage as a bonus action, or add +1d4 to each <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Roll during their turn.
Able to Dash or Disengage as a bonus action, or add 1d4 to each damage roll.
Direct up to five allies to strike a foe. They immediately use their reaction to make a weapon attack.
Bestow courage to up to six creatures, removing any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> conditions.
Project an aura that grants you and your allies [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> whenever a nearby enemy is reduced to 0 hit points.
Gains <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> whenever a nearby enemy creature is reduced to 0 hit points.
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> to nearby allies when reducing an enemy to 0 hit points.
Instill up to six creatures with a surge of confidence, gaining an extra action each turn.
Able to take an additional action this turn.

Invoke fear in a creature, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> them. The target can repeat the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> at the end of its turn if it can't see you.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Can repeat the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> if the caster is out of sight.

Cloak yourself in unsettling psychic energy, halving the movement speed of nearby enemies.

Creatures that are immune to being Frightened are unaffected.
Emitting an aura that halves the movement speed of nearby enemies.
Sow chaos in up to eight creatures, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIMMASK_SPORES">Befuddling</LSTag> them.
Evoke fury in up to three allies, granting them +1d4 to melee weapon damage rolls.

Rouse up to 3 creatures, increasing their movement speed by [1] but giving them <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Movement speed increased by [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Unleash an aura of rage, giving all nearby creatures <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls.
Flood rage into a creature, preventing it from taking any actions other than melee attacks.
Unable to take any actions but melee attacks.
Soothe up to three creatures, granting them [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
Comfort up to three allies, giving them +1d4 to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Radiate an aura of distracting mirth, giving nearby creatures <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Release a soothing pulse to up to six allies, giving them +5 to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> until your next turn.
Scrutinize an enemy, giving it <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
Study a creature's aura, giving you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against it.
Caster has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against this creature.
Grant yourself and nearby allies superior sight, gaining a +10 bonus to Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
As a reaction, impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on an attack against you. If it still hits you, deal [1] damage to the attacker.

As a reaction, when you make an Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can gain a +1 bonus to that <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> per psi point spent.

Manifest a field of protective psionic energy, giving nearby allies <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to psychic damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to psychic damage. <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Exude an aura of sympathetic power, Charming nearby creatures.
Exert an aura of power that grabs a creature's attention, forcing it to look at you.
Inspire awe in up to 5 creatures, bending them to your will.

Open yourself to receive momentary insights, giving you +1d4 to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
+1d4 to Ability <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
As a reaction, impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on an incoming attack.
Create a psychic model of reality and peer into its future, gaining a +10 bonus to Initiative and preventing you from being Surprised.
+10 to Initiative and can't be Surprised.
Impart knowledge of the future to up to six creatures, giving them +10 to Initiative the next time they start combat.
Blast a creature with psionic energy.
Fill a creature with self-doubt, preventing it from taking actions other than Disengage or Hide.
Can't take actions other than Disengage or Hide.
Stimulate a creature's impulses, preventing them from taking actions except for melee attacks.
Can't use actions other than melee attacks.
Unleash devastating psychic energy in a cone.
Warp and compress space around the targeted area, Stunning any creatures within.
Obfuscate an enemy's vision, reducing their sight range significantly.
Incapacitate an enemy until the end of your next turn or until it takes damage.
Evoke a storm of psionic energy, causing creatures within to suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Touch a creature to make them resistant to the elements, making them immune to Acid, Wet, Burning and Chilled.
<LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Acid, Wet, Burning, Chilled.
As a reaction, when taking Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage you can become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to that damage until the end of your next turn.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Thunder damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Acid damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Cold damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Fire damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Lightning damage.
Touch a creature and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Thunder damage.
Manifest sharp claws and swipe at the target.
Alter your physical form and gain beast-like qualities.
Manifest wings, gaining the ability to Fly.
Gain the ability to see Invisible creatures.
Your skin becomes as tough as leather, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2.
Muster up your strength, giving you [1] increased damage on your next melee attack this turn.
Next melee attack deals an additional [1] damage.
Blast your target with immense strength, knocking them back [1].
Does not consume reaction points or psi points.
Propel yourself with psionic energy, jumping up to [1].
Augment your own physical ability, gaining a +5 bonus to Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> until the end of your next turn.
Quicken your steps, increase your movement speed by [1].

Improve your reflexes, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on incoming attacks.
<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Attacks against this creature have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Obscure your own movements, becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
Hasten your steps, gaining the effects of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag> action.
Gain a surge of energy, granting you an additional action this turn.
Discharge a spray of venom, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoning</LSTag> the target creature.
As a reaction, after you take damage you can cause acid to spray from your wounds, dealing [1] damage to creatures within [2].
Exhale a wave of acid in a line before you.
Exhale a cloud of noxious gas in a cone before you.
Alter your form, reducing in size and becoming harder to see.

<LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, size reduced and carrying capacity reduced. +5 to Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Topple an enemy, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
As a reaction, when you are hit by an attack you can cause it to miss, and you gain the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>.
Reduce your size significantly, becoming much harder to see and hit, but negating weapon damage.

<LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, size reduced significantly and carrying capacity reduced. +10 to Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increased by 5. Weapon damage negated.
Grow in size, gaining [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. Melee weapon attacks will deal an additional [2] damage and have [3] increased range.
Weapon attacks deal an additional [1] damage. Melee weapon attack range increased by [2].
Grow to a tremendous size gaining [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. Melee weapon attacks will deal an additional [2] damage and have [3] increased range.
Weapon attacks deal an additional [1] damage. Melee weapon attack range increased by [2].
As a reaction, when you are hit by an attack you can harden your skin, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 3 until the end of your next turn.
Fortify your body, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing damage until the end of your next turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing damage.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing or Slashing damage.
Heal a creature you can touch.
Cure a creature from disease, poison, paralysis or blindness.
Revive a companion from death. They return to life with 1 hit point.

Touch a creature and negate any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETRIFIED">Petrification</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag>, or curse afflicting it.

Transform your weapons into pure psionic energy. Your next attack becomes a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Roll, dealing half damage on a sucessful save.
Weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls become Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> instead, dealing half damage on save.
Imbue your weapons with psychic energy. Your next weapon attack will deal an additional [1] damage.
Next weapon attack deals an additional [1] damage.
Infuse a weapon with psionic energy. The weapon becomes magical, receiving a +3 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage Rolls.
Imbue your ranged weapon with psionic energy. The next attack you make with it deals an additional [1] damage.
Next ranged weapon attack deals an additional [1] damage.
As a reaction, when you miss with a ranged weapon attack, you can repeat the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls against the same target.
Imbue your ranged weapon with a limited sentience, allowing you to perform an extra ranged weapon attack for free each turn.
Able to perform an additional ranged weapon attack for free.
Blend in with your surroundings, gaining a +10 bonus to Stealth and gaining the effects of Hide. You lose these effects when you stop Hiding.

Cloak yourself from sight, turning yourself <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag>. Attacks against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> and you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Turn yourself <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag>. Attacks against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> and you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Sense disturbances in the earth. You and nearby allies can't be Surprised.
Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

Gain True Sight, gaining the ability to see past magical and non-magical darkness, see Invisible creatures and imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> to non-allied creatures.
Fly up to [1] in a gust of wind.
Release a wind blast that knocks targets <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Seize control of the air around, create a protective veil. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> rolls against you will have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> and when a melee attack misses you, you can use your reaction to force the creature to repeat the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> roll on itself.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> Rolls against this creature have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. Able to retaliate when an incoming melee attack misses.
Manipulate the winds around you, gaining the ability to Fly.

Transform yourself or an ally into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage. The cloud has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Cause a creature to spontaneously combust into flames, setting them aflame.
Summon a patch of flames, dealing [1] damage to creatures when placed and when they end their turn inside.
Taking [1] damage at the end of each turn.
Wreathe yourself in flames, dealing [1] damage to creatures that end their turn within [2] of you.
Dealing [1] damage to creatures that end their turn within [2] of you.
Taking [1] at the end of your turn.
Exert a wave of kinetic force, pushing a creature [1].
Unleash concentrated burst of energy in a small area, pushing enemies away from its epicenter.
Encase yourself in a veil of pure kinetic energy, increasing your base Armour Class to 14.
Grasp a creature in telekinetic energy, Restraining it. While concentrating on this, you can cast Crush.
Hurl a sharp chunk of ice, reducing the target's movement speed by [1].
Condense and freeze the air in an area, creating an ice surface.
Sheathe yourself in icy resilience, gaining [1] temporary hit points.

Create an area filled with deathly cold and saturated moisture, reducing the movement speed of creatures within to 0. Each turn, creatures affected make a Strength Saving Throw to attempt to free themselves.
Summon a cloud of darkness with a radius of [1].
Touch a creature, causing it to shed a bright light. Attack rolls against it will have Advantage and it won't be able to hide.
Attack Rolls against this creature have Advantage. Can't hide.
TODO: Shadow Beasts Description, this will probably be done last
Drain the moisture from a creature.
Unleash a jet of water in a line, battering creatures caught in the blast.

Create a sphere of water around a creature, trapping it. While trapped, its speed is halved, it suffers Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and its sight range is reduced to [1], however, Attack Rolls against it also suffer Disadvantage. The creature can repeat the Saving Throw at the end of each of its turns.
Encased in a sphere of water. Movement speed halved. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls. Sight range is reduced to [1]. Incoming Attacks have Disadvantage.
Lash out with tendrils of lightning. Has Advantage on creatures wearing metal armour.
Summon a cloud that blocks vision.
Create a vortex of howling winds, pulling creatures towards its center.
Surge forward with a flash of lightning, shocking everything along your path.
Thunderous energy erupts in a targeted area, Stunning enemies inside.
Seize control of a weapon you're holding, dealing its damage plus an additional [1] damage to a creature.
Warp a creature's weapon, forcing them to drop it.
Warp a creature's armor. Their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 10 + their Dexterity modifier.
Raise a wall of non-magical, solid wood.
Strengthen your body, gaining Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Gain the ability to peer into minds and read thoughts.
After spending Psi Points, you can spend a bonus action to regain hit points equal 1 + half your Mystic level.
Able to cast Mystical Recovery, regaining [1].
Gain Profiency in a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> of your choice.
Gain Proficiency in Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain Proficiency in Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain Proficiency in Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain Proficiency in Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain Proficiency in Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain Proficiency in Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Project an inspiring aura, giving nearby allies +2 to Initiative.
Project a soothing aura, causing nearby allies to regain 2 additional hit points from all sources of healing.
Receives 2 additional hit points from all healing sources.

While not wearing armour, you add your Constitution Modifier to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
At the start of each of your turns, gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your Intelligence modifier.
As a reaction, halve incoming damage. Usable once per Short or Long Rest.
